recipes.name: Gauffres
recipes.instructions: Mélanger les ingrédients, laisser reposer, cuire au gaufrier

recipes.name: pasta salad olives
recipes.instructions: Cook the pasta, cut the tomatoes and olives, mix everything together

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.instructions: Preheat oven, cream butter and sugars, add eggs and vanilla, mix in dry ingredients and chocolate chips, drop dough onto baking sheets, bake until golden brown

recipes.name: Chicken Alfredo
recipes.instructions: Cook the chicken, cook the pasta, melt butter in a pan, add garlic and cream, stir in Parmesan cheese, season with salt and pepper, add cooked chicken and pasta, toss to coat

recipes.name: Caprese Salad
recipes.instructions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella cheese, arrange on a plate, sprinkle with basil leaves, drizzle with balsamic glaze and olive oil, season with salt and pepper

recipes.name: Grilled Salmon
recipes.instructions: Preheat grill, brush salmon with olive oil, squeeze lemon juice over salmon, season with salt, pepper, and dill, grill for 5-7 minutes on each side

recipes.name: Margarita Pizza
recipes.instructions: Preheat oven, roll out pizza dough, spread olive oil on the dough, top with sliced tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil leaves, season with salt and pepper, bake until crust is golden brown

recipes.name: Chicken Stir-Fry
recipes.instructions: Slice chicken into strips, heat oil in a pan, add chicken, garlic, and ginger, stir-fry until chicken is cooked, add mixed vegetables and soy sauce, cook until vegetables are tender, season with salt and pepper

recipes.name: Vegetable Soup
recipes.instructions: Chop vegetables, heat oil in a pot, add onion, carrots, and celery, cook until softened, add potatoes, tomatoes, vegetable broth, bay leaves, and thyme, bring to a boil, simmer until vegetables are tender, season with salt and pepper

recipes.name: Beef Tacos
recipes.instructions: Cook ground beef in a pan, drain excess fat, add taco seasoning and water, simmer until heated through, warm taco shells, fill with beef, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, sour cream, and guacamole
